sect2.title: Configuring Vim
sect2.para: By default Vim runs in vi compatible mode. Some people might like this, but we have a high preference to run vim in vim mode (else we wouldn't have included Vim in this book but the original Vi). Create the /root/.vimrc by running the following:

para.screen:
cat > /root/.vimrc << "EOF" " Begin /root/.vimrc
set nocompatible set bs=2
" End /root/.vimrc EOF
